item.title: CVE-2023-35039|2024-08-02T16:17:04.210Z -- be%20devious%20web%20development -- password%20reset%20with%20code%20for%20wordpress%20rest%20api
item.description: Improper Restriction of Excessive Authentication Attempts vulnerability in Be Devious Web Development Password Reset with Code for WordPress REST API allows Authentication Abuse.This issue affects Password Reset with Code for WordPress REST API: from n/a through 0.0.15.
